select dept1.`name` 'deptName' , dept.`name` 'groupName' , udev.realname 'staffName' , p.`name` 'productName' , b.id 'bugId' , (case when b.`status`='active' then '待处理' when b.`status`='resolved' then '已解决' when b.`status`='closed' then '已关闭' else b.`status` end) 'status' , DATE_FORMAT(b.openedDate, '%Y-%m-%d') 'createdDate' , DATE_FORMAT(b.resolvedDate, '%Y-%m-%d') 'completeTime' , b.title 'remark' from zt_bug b left JOIN zt_user utest on utest.account = b.openedBy left JOIN zt_user udev on udev.account = IF(b.resolvedBy is not null and b.resolvedBy <> '', b.resolvedBy, b.assignedTo) left join zt_dept dept on dept.id = udev.dept left join zt_dept dept1 on dept1.id = dept.parent left join zt_product p on p.id = b.product where 1=1
and udev.account = '${params.username}'
and udev.dept = '${params.deptId}'
and b.`openedDate` >= '${params.beginDate}'
and b.`openedDate` < DATE_ADD('${params.endDate}',INTERVAL 1 DAY)
and b.type = '${params.type}'
and b.type = '${params.type}'
and (b.type is null or b.type not in ('online','verify'))
and dept1.`name` like '${params.deptName}%'
and dept.`name` like '${params.groupName}%'
and udev.realname like '${params.staffName}%'
and b.id = ${params.bugId}
and b.deleted = '0' ORDER BY dept1.id, dept.id, udev.id

select max(dept1.`name`) 'deptName' , max(dept.`name`) 'groupName' , max(udev.realname) 'staffName' , sum(if(b.type in ('codeerror', 'security', 'performance', 'standard', 'designdefect', 'others') or b.type is null, 1, 0)) 'offlineBugs' , sum(if(b.type='online', 1, 0)) 'onlineBugs' , sum(if(b.type='verify', 1, 0)) 'verifyBugs' , '' as 'score' , '' as 'remark' from zt_bug b left JOIN zt_user utest on utest.account = b.openedBy left JOIN zt_user udev on udev.account = IF(b.resolvedBy is not null and b.resolvedBy <> '', b.resolvedBy, b.assignedTo) left join zt_dept dept on dept.id = udev.dept left join zt_dept dept1 on dept1.id = dept.parent left join zt_product p on p.id = b.product where 1=1
and udev.account = '${params.username}'
and udev.dept = '${params.deptId}'
and b.`openedDate` >= '${params.beginDate}'
and b.`openedDate` < DATE_ADD('${params.endDate}',INTERVAL 1 DAY)
and dept1.`name` like '${params.deptName}%'
and dept.`name` like '${params.groupName}%'
and udev.realname like '${params.staffName}%'
and (b.resolution is null or b.resolution in ('', 'postponed', 'fixed')) and b.deleted = '0' GROUP BY dept1.id, dept.id, udev.id ORDER BY dept1.id, dept.id, udev.id

select dept1.`name` 'deptName' , dept.`name` 'groupName' , u.realname 'staffName' , t.estimate 'estimate' , t.name 'taskName' , tet1.consumed 'consumed' , case when t.status is null or t.status='' or t.status='NULL' then '无状态' when t.status='wait' then '未开始' when t.status='doing' then '进行中' when t.status='done' then '已完成' when t.status='pause' then '已暂停' when t.status='cancel' then '已取消' when t.status='closed' then '已关闭' else '-' end 'status' , DATE_FORMAT(t.openedDate, '%Y-%m-%d') 'openedDate' , DATE_FORMAT(t.finishedDate, '%Y-%m-%d') 'finishedDate' , DATE_FORMAT(t.deadline, '%Y-%m-%d') 'deadline' from zt_task t INNER JOIN ( select tet.account , tet.task , max(tet.left) estimate , SUM(tet.consumed) consumed from zt_taskestimate tet where 1=1
and tet.date >= '${params.beginDate}'
and tet.date < DATE_ADD('${params.endDate}',INTERVAL 1 DAY)
group by tet.account, tet.task ) tet1 on tet1.task = t.id and tet1.account = if(t.finishedBy is not null and t.finishedBy <> '', t.finishedBy, t.assignedTo) left JOIN zt_user u on u.account = if(t.finishedBy is not null and t.finishedBy <> '', t.finishedBy, t.assignedTo) left join zt_dept dept on dept.id = u.dept left join zt_dept dept1 on dept1.id = dept.parent where 1=1
and u.account = '${params.username}'
and u.dept = '${params.deptId}'
and dept1.`name` like '${params.deptName}%'
and dept.`name` like '${params.groupName}%'
and u.realname like '${params.staffName}%'
and t.deleted = '0' ORDER BY dept1.id, dept.id, u.id

select dept1.`name` 'deptName' , dept.`name` 'groupName' , u.realname 'staffName' , t.estimate 'estimate' , t.id 'taskId' , t.name 'taskName' , tet1.consumed 'consumed' , tet1.account 'loginName' , DATE_FORMAT(t.openedDate, '%Y-%m-%d') 'openedDate' , DATE_FORMAT(t.finishedDate, '%Y-%m-%d') 'finishedDate' , DATE_FORMAT(t.deadline, '%Y-%m-%d') 'deadline' from zt_task t INNER JOIN ( select tet.account , tet.task , max(tet.left) estimate , SUM(tet.consumed) consumed from zt_taskestimate tet where 1=1
and tet.date >= '${params.beginDate}'
and tet.date < DATE_ADD('${params.endDate}',INTERVAL 1 DAY)
group by tet.account, tet.task ) tet1 on tet1.task = t.id and tet1.account = if(t.finishedBy is not null and t.finishedBy <> '', t.finishedBy, t.assignedTo) left JOIN zt_user u on u.account = if(t.finishedBy is not null and t.finishedBy <> '', t.finishedBy, t.assignedTo) left join zt_dept dept on dept.id = u.dept left join zt_dept dept1 on dept1.id = dept.parent where 1=1
and u.account = '${params.username}'
and u.dept = '${params.deptId}'
and dept1.`name` like '${params.deptName}%'
and dept.`name` like '${params.groupName}%'
and u.realname like '${params.staffName}%'
and t.deleted = '0' and t.status in ('wait','doing') ORDER BY dept1.id, dept.id, u.id

select t1.* , CONVERT(if(t1.excellentCompleteTasks=0 or t1.completeTasks=0, 0, (t1.excellentCompleteTasks/t1.completeTasks*100)), DECIMAL(18,2)) as 'excellentCompleteRate' , CONVERT((t1.completeTasks/t1.tasks*100), DECIMAL(18,2)) as 'planCompleteRate' , CONVERT(t1.consumed/(@workdays*8)*100, DECIMAL(18,2)) 'loadDaturation' , CONVERT((t1.estimate-t1.consumed)/(@workdays*8)*100, DECIMAL(18,2)) 'loadDeviation' , CONVERT((t1.completeTasks/t1.tasks*60), DECIMAL(18,2)) as 'score' , '' as 'adjustScore' , '' as 'collator' , '' as 'remark' from ( select max(dept1.`name`) 'deptName' , max(dept.`name`) 'groupName' , max(u.realname) 'staffName' , COUNT(1) 'tasks' , CONVERT(sum(t.estimate), DECIMAL(18,2)) 'estimate' , CONVERT(sum(tet1.consumed), DECIMAL(18,2)) 'consumed' , CONVERT(sum(if(t.`status` in ('done', 'closed') and tet1.consumed<t.estimate, 1, 0)), DECIMAL(18,2)) 'excellentTasks' , CONVERT(sum(if(t.`status` in ('done', 'closed') and tet1.consumed<t.estimate, t.estimate-tet1.consumed, 0)), DECIMAL(18,2)) 'excellentTasksHour' , CONVERT(sum(if(DATEDIFF(tet1.date, t.deadline)>0 and tet1.consumed>t.estimate, 1, 0)), DECIMAL(18,2)) 'timeoutTasks' , CONVERT(sum(if(DATEDIFF(tet1.date, t.deadline)>0 and tet1.consumed>t.estimate, tet1.consumed-t.estimate, 0)), DECIMAL(18,2)) 'timeoutTasksHour' , CONVERT(sum(if(t.`status` in ('done', 'closed'), 1, 0)), DECIMAL(18,2)) 'completeTasks' , CONVERT(sum(if(t.`status` in ('done', 'closed') and DATEDIFF(tet1.date, t.deadline)<=0, 1, 0)), DECIMAL(18,2)) 'excellentCompleteTasks' , CONVERT(sum(if(t.`status` in ('done', 'closed') and DATEDIFF(tet1.date, t.deadline)<=0, tet1.consumed, 0)), DECIMAL(18,2)) 'excellentCompleteTasksHour' from zt_task t INNER JOIN ( select tet.account , tet.task , max(tet.left) estimate , SUM(tet.consumed) consumed , max(tet.date) date from zt_taskestimate tet where 1=1
and tet.date >= '${params.beginDate}'
and tet.date < DATE_ADD('${params.endDate}',INTERVAL 1 DAY)
group by tet.account, tet.task ) tet1 on tet1.task = t.id and tet1.account = if(t.finishedBy is not null and t.finishedBy <> '', t.finishedBy, t.assignedTo) left JOIN zt_user u on u.account = if(t.finishedBy is not null and t.finishedBy <> '', t.finishedBy, t.assignedTo) left join zt_dept dept on dept.id = u.dept left join zt_dept dept1 on dept1.id = dept.parent where 1=1
and u.account = '${params.username}'
and u.dept = '${params.deptId}'
and dept1.`name` like '${params.deptName}%'
and dept.`name` like '${params.groupName}%'
and u.realname like '${params.staffName}%'
and t.`status` not in ('cancel', 'pause') and t.deleted = '0' GROUP BY dept1.id, dept.id, u.id ORDER BY dept1.id, dept.id, u.id ) t1
select u.*, d.`name` 'deptName' from zt_user u LEFT JOIN zt_dept d on u.dept = d.id where u.account = '${username}'
select * from zt_dept where id <> 0 order by grade
select * from zt_dept where id <> 0 order by id
